title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: The issue occurs when using build 20020508 with the latest UI code. When attempting to close all editors by selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, nothing happens.
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after creating a new file f1.txt, I select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, but nothing happens.
EB: When selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu after creating a new file f1.txt, the file should close since no changes have been made.
SR:
1. Open the application with build 20020508 and the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file f1.txt.
3. Go to the file menu and select 'Close All Saved'.
4. Verify that the file f1.txt does not close.
